summary: An ordinance repealing Ordinance No. 37882, entitled: "An ordinance providing for the condemnation, appropriation, taking and damaging of land and other property and property rights and privileges necessary for an approach to the West Spokane Street drawbridge, and providing for the payment therefor", authorizing the dismissal of the condemnation proceeding in the Superior Court based upon said ordinance, and appropriating money for the payment of all taxable costs.
